title.rendered: GDL Transport Holding divests GDL Anläggning & Miljö

content.rendered:
GDL Transport Holding AB, part of the Danish DSV Miljø Group A/S, divests its majority-owned subsidiary GDL Anläggning & Miljö AB to a wholly-owned subsidiary of the German group Mutares SE & Co. KGaA.

GDL Anläggning & Miljö AB, with approximately 60 employees across 16 locations in Sweden, has an annual turnover of approximately SEK 1 billion. GDL Anläggning & Miljö AB is a modern and environmentally conscious company, active in the environmental and recycling segment, transportation and ballast and machine rental. GDL Anläggning & Miljö AB offers its services through an extensive network of subcontractors. The transaction is subject to customary regulatory approvals and is expected to close in the first quarter of 2025.

Mannheimer Swartling advised GDL Transport Holding AB in the transaction.
